title: How to Do It: My Husband Went on a Date With His Ex-Girlfriend
description:
Stoya and Rich discuss a letter from a woman whose experiment with “ethical non-monogamy” isn’t going the way she expected.
***
Read the How to Do It column on Slate here. If you’re in need of sex advice from Stoya and Rich, write in here or leave a voicemail at ‪(347) 640-4025 and we may use it on the show. Remember, it’s anonymous—and nothing is too embarrassing!
Production by Chau Tu.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: In retrospect, this may have been a mistake.
